tweet: Some people think that because litecoin didn't jump on ltc halving, btc halving will also be irrelevant for #bitcoin. That logic is flawed. LTC price doesn't have a significant relationship with stock to flow, so halvings are indeed irrelevant. BTC price-s2f relation is strong 🚀

Litecoin is a scam.   It’s NOT scarce. You can tell simply by the way Charlie got rid of his stash in late 2017.   Without its marketing efforts, $LTC would be irrelevant.   Zero interest in development.  If you want fast payments, use LN.   Bitcoin has its own testnet.
